# Cash Drawer Daily Close Out

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/cash-drawer-daily-close-out/

## Category
18 Payments

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
PAYMENTS
CASH DRAWER
Cash Drawer Daily Closeout

To close out the cash drawer at the end of the day, open the Cash Drawer app and select New Pay-Out.

Enter either an Amount to pay out or Amount after pay-out.

Amount to pay out: Amount you are taking out of the drawer.

Amount after pay-out: Amount that is staying in the drawer.

Select Save & Record.

The current count is updated.

To print the current count, select Print from the "..." menu.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.

© Mangomint, Inc. All rights reserved.
